data.title: Lunch at Sweets and Eats
data.text: Down home cooking!  Daily blue plate lunch specials are popular and delicious.  Appreciate having soup, beans, and vegetable beef stew on the menu too.  Affordable prices.  Food always received timely.

data.title: Great lunch
data.text: We walked up a couple of blocks from our conference and were thrilled to find this location - food served quickly, the special was yummy (chicken and potatoes) and the chili frito pie was great.  Friendly staff.

data.title: Best strawberry cake you'll ever eat
data.text: So...I've already reviewed the blue plate special and how fantastic it always is but I forgot to mention how great their strawberry cake is! They give you a massive piece with frosting and sprinkles. Sprinkles!!

data.title: Down home cooking at reasonable prices
data.text: Slow cooked pot roast was the blue plate special, and you could taste that they took their time preparing it.

data.title: Lots of choices for home cooking
data.text: Great home cooking in the middle of the city. We eat here for a quick lunch. The prices are great. If you don't order the Blue Plate Special it takes a couple minutes longer to get your food. Totally worth the wait though!

data.title: Home cooking if you don't cook yourself
data.text: Everyone raves about this place, but I just don't see why.  Its not bad, its is frequently packed at lunch (especially for pot roast), but for me it is just what I cook at home.  Its not bad, just not something I would pick for lunch.

data.title: Good Home Cooking
data.text: A good stop for some home-style cooking; as others have said, the blue plate special is the way to go - chicken, catfish, meatloaf, whatever it is for that day + potatoes + a vegetable (usually in a buttery sauce), plus a nice buttery role.  Don't eat here expecting to eat healthy, just enjoy the food.  The other menu items are ok, but I'd stick with the daily special - much fresher, and a good amount of food for the money.

data.title: Best pot roast ever!
data.text: Sweets & Eats has a different blue plate special every day.  Their pot roast on Thursdays is just wonderful. I love their chicken pot pie, the meat loaf is great and in the winter I get the stew and cornbread a lot.  Everything I have ordered off the menu has been very good.  They have home made rolls and desserts that are awesome

data.title: Yes.  Great lunch spot!
data.text: Just really good food!  I could eat here daily.  Thursday's blue plate roast beef plate is always a treat.  The taco salad is just plain good.  Inexpensive and good.  What could be better ?

data.title: Try the Blue Plate Special
data.text: I was wandering downtown Oklahoma City on vacation looking for a place to eat. I wanted a local place, not a chain. I saw many business people heading into Sweets and Eats so I gave it a try. I am glad I did. The Blue Plate Special for the day was catfish with cole slaw, baked potato, and hush puppies. You place your order at one window and pick up at another. Then, they have a "fixin's bar" on a table to get your butter, etc. The food was delicious and the tables were cleaned right away after diners left.

data.title: Great Lunch Place for "Comfort" Food
data.text: I've never had a bad meal here.  Specials change each day.  Standard menu very reliable.  Great food.  Typically has a variety of soups.  Never run out.  Home cooking.  Typical setting for an OKC cafe/restaurant.  Very accommodating management.  Quick service.  I like this place and try to eat there at least once a week.  This week I had turkey and dressing.  It was EXCELLENT as always.

data.title: Great Specials
data.text: My husband and I met and had lunch here last week while we were in the area for a conference and was pleasantly surprised by how great the food was for the price. They offer a blue plate special daily and have several other things to choose from on the menu. It was really packed but they got you through the line fast so you didn't have to stand and wait for very long. My husband had the special (lasagna) and I had the frito chili pie. Both were really good. The place had cute decor with a variety of tea pots and cute items all over the place. It was very comfortable. If we are in the are we will return.

data.title: great hometown cooking!
data.text: This is only open for lunch during the week but has a blue plate special everyday like roast, fried catfish, lasagna, etc..  They also have great stew and chili!

data.title: Great home cooking.  Definitely get the blue plate special.
data.text: This place serves food just like mom makes.  When we went they had a roast beef special and one of my colleagues ordered the meatloaf sandwich.  Really good stuff!  Don't forget the desserts!

data.title: delish
data.text: Try the strawberry cake; taco salad; or any of their specials. They serve real food here-- mashed potatoes, roast, that sort of thing. Excellent little place, open for lunch only.

data.title: Homecooked meals on a cold wintry day
data.text: It's a great place to go for a nice hot meal.  It has a fun ambiance that is relaxed and the portions are exceptional.
